Sentence.value: The CA-125 blood test measures the level of the protein CA-125 in the blood.
Sentence.pattern_crowdsource: The CA-125 blood test measures the level of the [[protein|C0033684]] CA-125 in the [[blood|C0005767]].

Sentence.value: CA-125 is a protein that is found more in ovarian cancer cells than in other cells.
Sentence.pattern_crowdsource: CA-125 is a [[protein|C0033684]] that is found more in ovarian cancer [[cells|C0007634]] than in other cells.

Sentence.value: This blood test is often used to monitor women who have been diagnosed with ovarian cancer.
Sentence.pattern_crowdsource: This blood test is often used to monitor [[women|C0043210]] who have been diagnosed with [[ovarian cancer|C0029925]].

Sentence.value: The CA-125 test may also be done if a woman has symptoms or findings on ultrasound that suggest ovarian cancer.
Sentence.pattern_crowdsource: The CA-125 test may also be done if a [[woman|C0043210]] has [[symptoms|C1457887]] or findings on ultrasound that suggest ovarian cancer.

Sentence.value: In a woman who has ovarian cancer, a rise in CA-125 usually means that the disease has progressed or come back (recurred).
Sentence.pattern_crowdsource: In a [[woman|C0043210]] who has [[ovarian cancer|C0029925]], a rise in CA-125 usually means that the disease has progressed or come back (recurred).

Sentence.value: In a woman who has not been diagnosed with ovarian cancer, a rise in CA-125 may mean a number of things.
Sentence.pattern_crowdsource: In a [[woman|C0043210]] who has not been diagnosed with [[ovarian cancer|C0029925]], a rise in CA-125 may mean a number of things.

Sentence.value: While it may mean that she has ovarian cancer, it can also indicate other types of cancer, as well as several other diseases, such as endometriosis, which are not cancer.
Sentence.pattern_crowdsource: While it may mean that she has ovarian cancer, it can also indicate other types of cancer, as well as several other [[diseases|C0012634]], such as [[endometriosis|C0014175]], which are not cancer.
